Lunar @ LSM 2014, Montpellier, France

05 Jul 2014

Lunar will attend the 15th Libre Software Meeting in Montpellier, France.

On July 5th and 6th, a booth will be held Esplanade Charles de Gaule downtown by volunteers from Tor and Nos oignons.

Lunar will hold a presentation about security challenges faced by Tor at Campus UM2 on Tuesday 8th, 15:40.

- admin
